summary: A new chief of a "Culture House" is planning to hold a terribly boring New Year concert. A group of young amateur actors are doing their best to liven up the concert.
cast: Igor Ilyinsky|Lyudmila Gurchenko|Yuri Belov|Georgiy Kulikov|Sergey Filippov|Olga Vlasova|Andrey Tutyshkin|Tamara Nosova|Gennadi Yudin|Vladimir Zeldin|Boris Petker|Valentin Bryleev|Aleksey Polevoy|Semyon Khmelnitskiy|Antonina Smetankina|Vladimir Pitsek|Feliks Yavorsky|Anatoliy Kirillov|Yelizaveta Pokrovskaya|Boris Gusakov|Yuriy Gusakov|Tamara Kruchova|Igor Lovitak|Pyetr Pomazkov|Olga Shmelova|Valentina Shmelova|Yevgenia Shmelova|Tamara Sokolova|Valentin Abramov|Arutyun Akopyan|Igor Belskiy|Inga Budkevich|Viktor Geraskin|Vladimir Gusev|Zoya Kharabadze|Yuriy Kireev|Stanislav Korenev|Ivan Kosykh|Mariya Kravchunovskaya|Lev Lobov|Valentin Maklashin|Inna Myasnikova|Svetlana Nemolyaeva|Andrey Nikolayev|Viktor Novoselsky|Ella Olkhovskaya|Vera Petrova|Eleonora Prokhnitskaya|Roza Romanovskaya|Yuriy Saulskiy|Vladimir Seleznyov|Nadezhda Sementsova|Larisa Shepitko|Nikolay Sibeikin|Vladimir Smirnov|Inna Ulyanova|Valentina Ushakova|Natalya Valandina|Vladimir Vasilyev|Zoya Zelinskaya
title: Karnavalnaya noch
